txt.en: The disturbed tomb in this clearing seemed to shimmer briefly with an odd eeriness. Perhaps it was only a trick of the light, but you should investigate more closely.
The disturbed tomb in this clearing seemed to shimmer briefly with an odd eeriness. Perhaps it was only a trick of the light, but you should investigate more closely.
You have dispersed Morrafn's fell light from this haunted place.

The strange tomb can be found north-west of Mincham's Camp, in the Fields of Fornost.\n\nYou should investigate the strange tomb.
